version_description:
Another big update we’re super excited about: You can now earn interest on your assets with ease. All within your wallet.

We’ve integrated with Compound to make this possible. So instead of just storing your assets you can put them to work.
Bug fixes and improvements

Fixed several crashes.
Updated to use new ENS registry.
App now shows Compound and DSR APY rate.

We’ve made it easier than ever to access desktop Dapps with lots of improvements to our Wallet Connect integration. We’ve also fixed a few bugs and simplified your overview of your account, with a new ‘Profile’ tab where ‘Settings’ was
You can now easily change your phone and email in app. And we've made our WalletConnect integration even smoother.
You can now easily change your phone and email in app. And we've made our WalletConnect integration even smoother.
Bug fixes and improvements
Updated information on how to convert SAI in light of Maker's DAI transition.
Welcome to Argent V1! We’ve removed the waitlist and added easy access to many more of the best DeFi Dapps. We’ve also improved the Guardian approval process to give you more redundancy.
Welcome to Argent V1! We’ve removed the waitlist and added easy access to many more of the best DeFi Dapps. We’ve also improved the Guardian approval process to give you more redundancy.
We’ve been polishing V1 to make one tap DeFi even smoother

Two big updates this week:
1) Say goodbye to unwanted tokens and declutter your wallet like Marie Kondo.
2) We introduce our fair use policy for gas. We’ll still pay gas for security, exchange, payments; but we won’t for every DeFi Dapp. This aligns sustainability, UX, and network incentives
Fixed a bug with failed Compound transactions.
We’ve been busy improving WalletConnect and fixing bugs. We’ve also introduced a small minimum investment size to help mitigate network congestion.
Fixes an issue buying and selling some investments
Fixes an issue buying and selling some investments
Two super slick design changes as we introduce dark mode and simplify the main Wallet screen. We’re also updating our fair use policy for transaction fees to cover in-app trades and Compound.
Improvements to Wallet Connect and minor bug fixes
Fixed an issue with trade slippage calculation
We’ve made it even easier for you to find the best investments, added alerts to avoid network congestion, and fixed a bunch of minor issues
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
bug fixes and update to gas refund logic
Fixes a bug with iOS12 compatibility
Fixes a bug with onboarding
Fixes a crash under iOS 14
It’s here: V2! Trade any token at the best price, using Uniswap, Kyber, Curve & many more. And easily pay gas for DeFi with a range of tokens. This update contains a smart contract upgrade.
It’s here: V2! Trade any token at the best price, using Uniswap, Kyber, Curve & many more. And easily pay gas for DeFi with a range of tokens. This update contains a smart contract upgrade.

It’s here: V2! Trade any token at the best price, using Uniswap, Kyber, Curve & many more. And easily pay gas for DeFi with a range of tokens. This update contains a smart contract upgrade.

Squashed some bugs from our recent release.

Trade any token at the best price, using Uniswap, Kyber, Curve & many more. And easily pay gas for DeFi with a range of tokens. This update contains a smart contract upgrade.

Squashed a bug related to sync failures for some wallets.
Easily earn with Balancer liquidity. You can also exchange with Uniswap, Curve, Kyber and more. This update contains a smart contract upgrade
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
